name: Het Kansara
initial_intro: Het Kansara is a Web & Mobile Application Developer located in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. He mainly works with front-end fameworks liks Angular, Ionic, Vue, React and (Any technology that you want him to work)! 😜
achievements_and_projects_info:
Hii!...

Me, Het Kansara welcomes you to quick introduction of my work and achievements.
Here are just few of them.
Hope you like it.
about_paragraphs: Het Kansara is a Web & Mobile Application developer with 1 year of industrial experience. He worked with multiple clients to cater to their IT needs through developing web & mobile applications. Also, He was awarded the certificate for providing a noteworthy contribution to the success of his employer's organization for the year 2018. Currently, He is enrolled in the Web Development - Graduate Certificate at Humber College and very excited to begin his industrial experience in Canada.
place_to_talk_text:
Thank you for your interest in my portfolio.
Feel free to talk with me for any other information.
Have a great day!

experience.designation: Jr. Software Developer - Part time Permanent
experience.description: Working on React native IOT project as a front-end developer and designer. (https://skiin.com/pages/app)

Worked on one of the biggest project of the company - WaterExpert by Ovivo (https://www.waterexpert.com) as lead frontend developer in Ionic/Angular. Implemented most complex modules of the project by myself.
Worked on one of the IOT project of the BizTech as lead frontend developer in Ionic/Angular. Implemented most complex modules of the project by myself.

testimonials.testomonial_message: I always get fascinated by his true passion and dedication for development. It is always joyful to work with him. He is like a one stop shop for any front-end development and I admire him for his love for JavaScript. Definitely recommend for any JavaScript/Front-End Solution.👍🏻
testimonials.relation: Het worked with Bharat in the same group

testimonials.testomonial_message: Het is a problem solver, an intelligent developer and a professional person and a fun guy to work with. Always enjoyed working with him!

testimonials.testomonial_message: Het is the funniest guy in room. If you're finding a problem solver in the room he is the guy. He is the best friend and co-worker at the same time.
